mention.text: the issue of extradition , which was the subject of a very intense debate last night at the chamber of representatives ' first commission
the extraordinary referendum scheduled for 21 january
drug traffickers who have committed crimes abroad
the treaties that colombia has signed with regard to extradition
100 years , since 1888 , and only now , when extradition is applied to drug traffickers
a general threat against all colombians
